name: Lewd Cell
description:
Hello to Lewd Cell, the first game from independent developer Lewd Leech.
Losing in games has never been this fun.
It aims to draw the player into a different atmosphere by combining sexuality in this 2D action platform genre.

Duty:
  • Destroy 7 cysts that spread the disease.
  • Defeat the 4 big bosses controlling the research ship.
  • Shut down the feeder that provides power and oil to the research ship.

Features:
  • While providing action, it forces the player to explore with small riddles.
  • 4 big and 2 mini bosses and different defeat methods.
  • Sexual animations that will be unlocked with in-game achievements.
  • Different ending scenes with the character being defeated
  • Sexual scenes in contact with enemies.
  • Control with keyboard and mouse.
  • Assign keyboard keys freely.

NSFW Scenes :
  • 45 NSFW animations of contact with enemies.
  • 30 NSFW animations will be unlocked through achievement progress
  • 5 defeat NSFW animations
